hero.title: Platform MERN Tamatut
hero.subtitle: Aserdex timezzegt s e-commerce, asefrek deg wakud ilaw akked usefrek n tutlayin timegrad

about.name: Aneflay Aneɣmas
about.title: Aneɣmas & Aneflay Full Stack
about.description: Nek d aneɣmas aεeṭṭun akked aneflay full stack si Lezzayer, Lezzayer. Abrid-iw yemmeslayen tafrayt tneɣmast akked tneɣmi tasnawant, snulfuyen tarmiwin tudmawin i d imɛawanen akken d imɛiwen.
about.journey: Tafelseft-iw n usnulfu tebda deg usendu CRUD aγelsan, yettwaseḥzen s tibḍarit n usnulfu AI am DeepSeek, Claude akked ChatGPT. Sɣur iseggasen n unadi yettwakkes akked usiḍen n ukod, selɣeɣ idegman tizmamin s iseqdacen id yettwaseklesen. Yal aseɣwen yettwakka d isragen n tisdatin n ufraz n wuguren akked uselmed usrid.
about.philosophy: Yerna d aγur n usellek akked usfeḍ n tsnilelt n ukod, tḥemlit-iw akked tɣil-iw ttemcawaken i wakken ad tafeɣ yal aseɣwen. Umneɣ ad ttwasekren isγanen d tifrawin n usɣer.

apps.title: Isseqdacen-iw deg Usɣer
apps.subtitle: Snirem tilɣa-inu n marketplace ideg iseqdacen zemren ad ttarun akked usunef s wudem uslig
apps.art_marketplace_desc: Platform i usɣar akked uznez n yiseɣwa n tneɣmast - Iseqdacen ttarun isluɣ-nsen
apps.real_estate_desc: Aswir n wakal - Iseqdacen ttarun akked usnirem n tifrawin n wakal
apps.automobiles_desc: Platform n usunef n tkerkas akked yitrank - Tira n yismal akked yiznan yettwaseɣrent sɣur iseqdacen
apps.smartphones_desc: Aswir n yibenkan aziraz - Iseqdacen sɣaren akked uznen yitelifunen s lḥurriya
apps.travel_agency_desc: Platform n yimahalen n irwel - Iseqdacen bḍun akked usireg n tarmiwin n irwel

multi_language.title: Anagraw n Tutlayin Timegrad
multi_language.description: Abeddel s talɣift gar 6+ n tutlayin deg-sent Tamaziɣt, Taɛrabt, Taglizit, Taspanyult, Tafransist akked ugar s yiwen usiti.

authentication.title: Tabaḍnit Tunṣibt
authentication.description: Tibḍarin timegrad n usentem: asesteb s ufus, tuqqna s usiti s umiḍan Google/Facebook, asentem s imayl akked usali n wawal uffir.

real_time_chat.title: Asefrek deg Wakud Ilaw
real_time_chat.description: Aznuzu uslig s tuzna n tugniwin, imḍanen n tuqqna akked unermes s talɣift srid seg yismal.

ecommerce.title: Anagraw E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Taεekcart n usɣar tamatut, afhim aγelsan s tmetti n yibankan adiganen akked amazray n tiɣin timeɣranin.

responsive.title: Yettwaεeddan Akken Iwata
responsive.description: Tarmit tigejdant ɣef yal ibenk: tiliɣri, tablet akked aselkim s tneɣruft tameynut.

performance.title: Taɣuri Tameqrant
performance.description: Tasnilelt MERN yettwasεedden s usfeḍ amawan, ileqman deg wakud ilaw akked usefrek n yisefka s wudem anmizan.

how_register.question: Amek ara d-tesεeddeɣ ɣef platform?
how_register.answer: Tzemreḍ ad tesεeddeḍ s kṛaḍ n tɣawsiwin: 1) Asesteb s ufus s imayl akked wawal uffir, 2) Asiti s umiḍan Google, 3) Asiti s umiḍan Facebook. Akk ten sran asentem s imayl.

language_change.question: Amek ara beddleɣ tutlayt?
language_change.answer: Sit ɣef umsebter n tutlayt deg ufeggag n unig, fren tutlayt-ik·im. Abeddel d arurad, yettwasεed ɣef platform meṛṛa.

post_validation.question: Acḥal n wakud ay yesra asentem n yismal?
post_validation.answer: Ismal ttwassentmen sɣur imsengaren deg tsinin neḍ tisdatin. Ad trem tilɣa mi ara yettwasentem asmel-ik·im ad yili d amven i tgemṭ.

security.question: Acu ten measures n tbadednit i yellan?
security.answer: Nesseqdec asentem JWT, asentem s imayl, anagraw n usewḥel amawan, asfeḍ n wass n yiseqdacen ur nettwasentmen ara, akked aḍessi n urmus deg wakud ilaw.

cta.title: Theggideḍ i wulad n tgemṭ?
cta.description: Sεedded tura, bdu seqdec akk timellalin n platform-nneɣ aserdex timezzegt.
